name.namePart: Printed with Dr. Robert McIllhenny, LSU

mods.abstract: A female face turned slightly to the right and tilted downward is depicted resting on frontally placed bust and neck.
mods.note: Artist's proof. The subject has a round face with eyes that slant slightly and have been watercolored green. The sitter has a small nose and mouth, arched eyebrows and wears her hair piled high on top and down her shoulders. The entire subject and background consists of irregularly shaped dots of various sizes. The subject has been left in the natural grey/blue/white of the cliché verre with the exception of the watercolored green eyes with a green border on the square neckline of the dress. The background has been watercolored yellow.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
